title: So I found another guy :)
body:
And I'm starting to quite like him. He's nice, cute, pretty amazing tbh :~) He always treats me with respect, kindness etc. He's actually flawless as well - and makes extremely funny jokes which make me smile 24/7 (although I'm kind of insecure about my smile). Everything about him is actually perfection... except for one thing :( He sucks at league! Holy moly! I'm trying to make good plays right and the loser just ruins everything. He's actually so bad LOL this is the only reason why I'm thinking about finding someone else.

This link actually describes our league relationship:
http://gfycat.com/LeadingAdmirableKinglet
I'm the Kog, doing my own cool shizniz and then the Annie (him) comes along casually and ruins everything. Sigh

And that's all for today from #STYLES'BOYZ xo

replies.body:
if you look closely you can she is going 5/17... and the annie is like 13/10..
Explain yourself women!
that clip is from reddit you spastic.

> that clip is from reddit you spastic.

Rekt
LOL

Take the leap. You don;t have to have absolutely everything in common. Might be your biggest mistake if you leave someone because they're new to league. Ofcourse he's shit.. To be any good at this game you need quite a few days of game time.. I've racked up around 70days playing time and my highest is still gold
tbh does anybody actually care about this sad, sad relationship?
I do :^)

pls bb

i can get challenger asap, dont leave me
pls, the other guy you want is elo boosted but me


I AM LEGIT
